data.text: Waterlogged ORR near KR Puram–Whitefield causing heavy traffic after evening rain. Avoid if possible.
Tree fallen across Sarjapur Main Road near Bikasipura after storm—lane blocked, cleanup underway.
Accident involving two cars on Hosur Road near HSR Layout causing delays—use service roads.
Metro construction near MG Road causing lane closures around Trinity Circle—expect slow traffic.
Flash mob on Brigade Road blocking one lane—traffic police managing flow, slight delays.
Mall traffic snarled on ORR near Marathahalli during evening peak—extra 20‑minute delay likely.
Cultivation protest on Outer Ring Road near Hebbal causing partial lane block—locally rerouted traffic.
Minor fire at roadside shop on 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar—fire brigade responded, one lane closed temporarily.
Overflowing sewage drain flooding sidewalk on Richmond Road near Cathedral—pedestrians detouring.
Community mela starting at Lalbagh Botanical Garden—expect increased foot traffic and entry queues.
Potholes reported on Bellary Road near Manyata Tech Park—commuters requesting urgent repairs.
Water logging outside Eco Space tech park entrance after rain—cars stuck near gate.
Cultural dance flash event at Town Hall—road adjacent slows, small pedestrian-only zone created.
Emergency ambulance blocking one lane on Cunningham Road near Residency Road—please detour.
Evening jogging group causing minor footpath crowding on Cubbon Road—cycling lane still free.

Bangalore Open Air music festival continues July 21–22 at Palace Grounds—expect heavy crowds, noise, and traffic diversions around Sampangi Rama Nagar.
Second day of Bangalore Open Air on July 22—entering/leaving venues may face security bottlenecks, use MG Road‑Cunningham perimeter.
Joseph & the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat musical running July 17‑19—crowd dispersal on Museum Road and Richmond Road causes evening gridlocks.
Post‑show exodus for musical on July 19—heavy pedestrian crossing on Museum Road, temporary barricades delayed traffic till 10 PM.
AHA! Theatre for Children Festival at Ranga Shankara from July 15–19—large crowds in JP Nagar evenings, expect slow traffic on 100‑Feet Road.
Final evening of children’s theatre fest July 19—vehicle movement restricted around KP Puram junction, footpaths overcrowded.
